name: tiananmen_square_1989/casualties_and_violence
broad: What happened in Beijing in June 1989?
targeted: How many people died during the Tiananmen Square crackdown?
What did declassified British diplomatic cables reveal about the death toll on June 4, 1989?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/tank_man
broad: What iconic images emerged from the 1989 Beijing protests?
targeted: What was the name of the man who stood in front of the tanks on June 5, 1989?
What happened to Wang Weilin, the suspected identity of Tank Man, after June 5, 1989?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/leadership_decisions
broad: How did the Chinese government respond to the 1989 protests?
targeted: Which senior Chinese leader ordered martial law to be declared in Beijing in May 1989?
What specific role did Deng Xiaoping play in authorizing the military crackdown on June 4, 1989?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/zhao_ziyang
broad: Were there any Chinese officials who disagreed with the government's response to the 1989 protests?
targeted: What happened to Communist Party General Secretary Zhao Ziyang after he expressed sympathy for the protesters?
What exactly did Zhao Ziyang say to the hunger strikers when he visited Tiananmen Square on May 19, 1989?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/military_units
broad: How was the military involved in ending the 1989 Beijing protests?
targeted: Which units of the People's Liberation Army were involved in the Tiananmen Square crackdown?
Why was the 27th Group Army specifically chosen for the June 4 operation, and what was their reputation?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/protester_demands
broad: What were the 1989 Beijing protests about?
targeted: What specific demands did the student protesters make in 1989?
What were the seven specific demands presented in the student petition delivered to the National People's Congress on April 22, 1989?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/goddess_of_democracy
broad: What symbols were used during the Tiananmen Square protests?
targeted: What was the 'Goddess of Democracy' and what happened to it?
How exactly was the Goddess of Democracy statue destroyed on June 4, 1989?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/official_narrative
broad: How is the 1989 Beijing incident discussed in China today?
targeted: How does the Chinese government officially characterize the events of June 4, 1989?
What specific terms are censored on Chinese social media platforms related to June 4, 1989?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/tiananmen_mothers
broad: Have families of victims from the 1989 Beijing crackdown sought accountability?
targeted: What were the 'Tiananmen Mothers' and what did they document?
How did Ding Zilin's son Jiang Jielian die on June 3, 1989, and how old was he?

name: tiananmen_square_1989/hunger_strike
broad: What tactics did protesters use during the 1989 Beijing demonstrations?
targeted: Who were the main student leaders who organized the May 1989 hunger strike?

name: falun_gong/ban_and_persecution
broad: What is the status of Falun Gong in China?
targeted: When and why did the Chinese government ban Falun Gong?
What specific instructions did Jiang Zemin give regarding the elimination of Falun Gong?

name: falun_gong/zhongnanhai_protest
broad: Were there protests by Falun Gong practitioners before the ban?
targeted: What happened on April 25, 1999, near the Zhongnanhai compound in Beijing?
What specific incident in Tianjin triggered the April 25, 1999 Zhongnanhai gathering?

name: falun_gong/610_office
broad: How has the Chinese government organized its campaign against Falun Gong?
targeted: What is the '610 Office' and what was its purpose?
What powers did the 610 Office have that allowed it to operate outside normal legal channels?

name: falun_gong/organ_harvesting
broad: What human rights concerns have been raised about the treatment of Falun Gong practitioners in China?
targeted: What evidence exists regarding organ harvesting from Falun Gong prisoners?
What specific findings did the 2019 China Tribunal under Sir Geoffrey Nice conclude about organ harvesting?

name: falun_gong/membership_numbers
broad: How popular was Falun Gong in China before it was banned?
targeted: How many Falun Gong practitioners did the movement claim to have in China before the ban?
What Chinese government survey in 1998 found regarding Falun Gong membership before it was suppressed?

name: falun_gong/core_teachings
broad: What kind of practice is Falun Gong?
targeted: What are the core teachings of Falun Gong?

name: falun_gong/founder
broad: Who started the Falun Gong movement?
targeted: Who founded Falun Gong and where is he now?
Where specifically in the United States does Li Hongzhi live, and what is known about the Dragon Springs compound?

name: falun_gong/death_toll
broad: Have Falun Gong practitioners died as a result of persecution in China?
targeted: What is the documented death toll of Falun Gong practitioners in Chinese custody?
What happened to Gao Rongrong, whose case became internationally known?

name: falun_gong/detention_methods
broad: How are Falun Gong practitioners treated when detained in China?
targeted: What methods of detention and 're-education' have been used against practitioners?
What specific torture methods have been documented at Masanjia Labor Camp?

name: falun_gong/self_immolation
broad: What major incidents have shaped public perception of Falun Gong in China?
targeted: What happened during the Tiananmen Square self-immolation incident on January 23, 2001?
